functionalRequirements:
### Business Objectives
Provide insight into product popularity/impact based on invoice data

### Functional Requirements
- Bar chart with products on x-axis showing invoice volume
- Clear Y-axis labels showing invoice count/money value
- Option to toggle between invoice count and monetary total
- Legend explaining chart types
- Time period selector for filtering
title: Product Invoice Volume Analysis
name: ProductInvoiceVolumeChart
userExplanation: This chart shows product performance based on invoice volume, allowing analysis by count or value with time filters.

entities.name: Products
entities.description: Master catalog of products and services offered by the organization

entities.name: Invoice Line Items
entities.description: Individual line items that appear on an invoice

queries.name: ProductInvoiceVolumeTrend
queries.description: Aggregates invoice volumes by product over time with date filtering

fields.name: InvoiceCount
fields.description: Count of invoices for the product

queries.newQuerySQL: SELECT p.ProductName, COUNT(il.Quantity) AS InvoiceCount, SUM(il.Quantity * il.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM CRM.vwProducts p INNER JOIN CRM.vwInvoiceLineItems il ON p.ID = il.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductName HAVING COUNT(il.Quantity) > 0 ORDER BY InvoiceCount DESC

dataRequirements.description: Data requirements for product invoice volume analysis chart

description: Interactive bar chart displaying product performance through invoice volume analysis with toggle options for count vs monetary value and time-based filtering.
technicalDesign:
## Component Architecture

### Main Component: ProductInvoiceVolumeChart
This is the root component that orchestrates the entire visualization. It manages the application state including the current view mode (count vs revenue), selected time period, and coordinates data flow between child components.

### Child Components:
1. **ChartContainer**: Core visualization component using ECharts for the bar chart display
2. **ToggleControl**: Switch component for toggling between invoice count and revenue views
3. **DateRangeFilter**: Date picker component for time-based filtering
4. **LegendDisplay**: Custom legend component explaining chart metrics
5. **ExportButton**: Component for exporting chart data in various formats

### State Management:
- All components manage their own UI state internally
- ChartContainer manages chart interactions and tooltips
- ToggleControl manages toggle state between count/revenue
- DateRangeFilter manages date selection state
- Parent component coordinates data flow and external events

### Data Flow:
1. ProductInvoiceVolumeChart receives data via props
2. Child components receive filtered data based on current settings
3. User interactions trigger events back to parent
4. Chart updates reflect current state of filters and toggles

### Implementation Details:
- Uses ECharts for powerful interactive charting
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Optimized rendering for large datasets
- Accessibility features for screen readers
- Export capabilities for PNG/SVG formats

dependencies.name: ChartContainer
dependencies.title: ECharts Bar Chart Container
dependencies.description: Core visualization component using ECharts to display interactive bar charts with hover tooltips and responsive design
dependencies.functionalRequirements: Display bar chart with products on x-axis and volume metrics on y-axis. Support hover tooltips, responsive resizing, and interactive features like zoom/pan.
dependencies.technicalDesign:
## ChartContainer Component
- Uses ECharts library for powerful bar chart rendering
- Manages chart options, data series, and responsive behavior
- Handles hover tooltips showing product name and current metric value
- Supports responsive design with automatic resizing
- Includes zoom and pan capabilities for large datasets
- Provides export functionality for chart images

dataRequirements.description: Chart data requirements using the ProductInvoiceVolumeTrend query

queries.name: ProductInvoiceVolumeTrend
queries.description: Query providing product names and volume metrics for chart display

fields.name: InvoiceCount
fields.description: Count of invoices for the product

properties.name: chartData
properties.description: Chart data array with product names and corresponding metric values

properties.name: yAxisLabel
properties.description: Label for the y-axis based on current view mode

properties.name: showGrid
properties.description: Whether to display grid lines on the chart

events.name: onChartClick
events.description: Triggered when user clicks on a chart bar

events.name: onChartHover
events.description: Triggered when user hovers over chart elements

parameters.name: productData
parameters.description: Data object for the hovered product

dependencies.exampleUsage: <ChartContainer chartData={chartData} chartTitle="Product Invoice Analysis" yAxisLabel="Invoice Count" />
